name: THIEFBOT
description:
A sneaky steal-'em-up starring TeeBee, wannabe-master-thief robot who's a bit clumsy but very determined.

Started out as basically a graphical overhaul of the ColecoVision game, The Heist, but is now its own thing. Sneak through sprawling levels, evade security lasers in the shadows, stuff your loot bag full of anything that sparkles, and maybe find some secrets?

Menu Controls

  • [Z] Confirm
  • [Arrows] Navigate

In-Game Controls

  • [L/R Arrows] Move
  • [Up Arrow] Interact
  • [Down Arrow] Hide
